steps.text: In a blender or food processor, combine the banana, oats, milk, cinnamon, and vanilla extract. Blend until smooth.
Heat the oil in a non-stick skillet over medium heat.
Pour small amounts of the pancake batter onto the skillet to form pancakes.
Cook for about 2-3 minutes on each side until golden brown.
Serve warm with your favorite toppings such as maple syrup, fresh fruits, or yogurt. Enjoy your delicious and nutritious banana oat pancakes!
